Products marked as done will be removed from your current shopping list and saved to your shopping history. Unmarked products will remain in your current list.

Welcome to GrocSS - Grocery Shopping Simple. This application will help to make your standard grocery shopping trips easier.

The products you add to your list will be sorted by categories, can be changed anytime, and can be easily removed.

If you finish your current shopping trip, the products marked as done are transferred into your shopping history. This history not only serves for overview purposes, but you also can select previously purchased products to be added to your current shopping list.

And if you are interested in your shopping behaviour, this app provides a statistics module for your purchases. Again, you can select and add products from the statistics directly to your current shopping list.

Have fun using this app!

HINT:\nWith a click on the product in your list it will be marked as done. By clicking long you can edit the chosen product. If you hit the button \"Finish purchase\" you will save all the products marked as done into your shopping history, while the others will remain in your current shopping list.
